meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ryan Nelson Tom Jennings Gitta Neufeld Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6073.

div.div: IBM Challenge mini-documentary: "What is a Grand Challenge?"

td.p: Ryan Nelson, a law student originally from Tampa, Florida
Tom Jennings, a maintenance mechanic from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Gitta Neufeld, a Judaic teacher trainer from Far Rockaway, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,300)

tr.td: THE WRITER
THE PERFORMER
THE DIRECTOR
THE CAMERA MAN
THE PRODUCER
"ACTION"!

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
